criterion: Provides a clear and structured note outline
Includes recommended labs and supplementation schedule as per ASMBS guidelines
Incorrectly recommends a specific protein intake amount (e.g., 60-80g) without considering individual patient factors
Fails to address borderline low ferritin levels in the consult note
Lacks clear instructions for patient to follow
Correctly explains the importance of protein intake post-bypass
Provides incorrect information about wound healing and muscle maintenance
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Does not provide clear guidance on diet progression
